about_1: We offer quests, called tours for low budget travelers who need a day trip, tourists from elsewhere wanting to experience the local culture, locals wanting to learn about the culture, locals history where you live.
about_2: Come with us, tourists will experience the local culture, landmarks, history, craft villages, food and attractive gifts waiting for you.
col1_footer_2: Address: 107/15 Truong Dinh Street, Vo Thi Sau Ward, District 3, Ho Chi Minh City
faq_answer_1: The term Quest in 24hTrip is self-sufficient tour. Quest Owners are the people who join the system, their job is to create Quests and earn income from it.
faq_answer_2: Please send us your CV. We will arrange an online call with you to find out about your work experience and skills. Don't hesitate, just fill out our form, we will contact you as soon as possible!
faq_answer_3: No. We give you a page to create your Quest with a friendly interface. Simply fill in text and upload images, videos or audio.
faq_answer_4: We will transfer funds to the Quest Owner in installments, each consisting of '1 month'.
faq_answer_5: We give you detailed instructions for each step. We also provide some great tips for you to make your Quest more effective, so you can earn more and more passive income. You can access these sections after you have been approved as our Quest Owner. Besides, you can also make an appointment to chat with 24hTrip for a direct consultation.

sub_title_about: We build a unique travel platform combined with Gamification to give travelers new experiences on every trip.
sub_title_download: A new tourism model will give domestic tourists a completely different feeling compared to traditional tours. With our Quest collections and ethnic storylines, you can delight in choosing the places to start your journey to explore a multitude of tourist destinations with family and friends.
